prod_desc.heading: Why buy Oneplus 10 Pro 5G
features: Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen Processor lets you run multiple apps
5000 mAh Battery perfect for continuous working
Triple Rear Camera with a single front camera to cherish moments
6.7” QHD Plus Display is more immersive than ever
256GB Storage lets you store your files with ease
sub_features: Loaded with premium specifications, the Oneplus 10 Pro 5G allows you to multitask, play games or run any heavy task without worrying about the operation speed. With 12GB RAM, you can install multiple applications and run them all together without disturbing the speed of the phone. It flaunts a brilliant camera combination of 48 MP (main camera), 50 MP (ultra-wide camera), and 8 MP (Telephoto camera). It comes with features Hasselblad Camera for Mobile, Nightscape, Ultra HDR, Smart Scene Recognition, Portrait Mode, Pro Mode, Panorama, Tilt-Shift mode, Long Exposure, 150° Mode, Dual-View Video, Retouch, Movie Mode, XPan Mode, Focus Peaking, Cat/Dog Face Focus, Raw file, Raw Plus file, Filters, Super Stable, Video Nightscape, Video HDR, Video Portrait, Focus Lock, Timelapse. Enjoy more detail in your photos and videos. It also comes with Face Unlock, HDR, Screen Flash, Face Retouching features.

The Oneplus 10 Pro 5G comes with a storage of 256GB that lets you store files with ease. This smartphone runs on OxygenOS based on the Android 12 operating system. With advanced technology like In-display Fingerprint Sensor, Accelerometer, Electronic Compass, Gyroscope, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Sensor Core, Flick-detect Sensor, the smartphone can stand up in style. Its 5000 mAh battery is perfect for continuous working. It features Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen Processor, along with Adreno 730 GPU, so you can carry out tasks without worrying about performance. It also comes with 5G support.  Go ahead and book the Oneplus 10 Pro 5G online, right now!

features.title: Display
features.desc: 6.7 inches (17.01 cm), QHD+ AMOLED, 120 Hz Refresh Rate

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 48 MP + 50 MP + 8 MP Triple Rear & 32 MP Front Camera

faqs.que: Where can I  find my OnePlus One IMEI?
faqs.ans:
a) Dial *#06# on your device to get your IMEI number or go to Settings > About phone to get the IMEI number. Enter the first IMEI number (IMEI1) if there are two IMEI numbers.
b) You can also find your IMEI number on the original package of your OnePlus One device.

faqs.que: How can I  activate my OnePlus One device?
faqs.ans: Please refer to the instructions here: https://forums.oneplus.com/threads/a-journey-from-one-to-10-showcase-your-oldest-oneplus-device.1553711/

faqs.que: What kind of phone is OnePlus?
faqs.ans: OnePlus releases two lines of smartphones: its flagship 'OnePlus' line, and its budget-oriented Nord line. Both lines are equipped with an Android-based operating system known as OxygenOS.
Seeing that OnePlus devices go through GMS certification and therefore the software is checked by Google or a certified third party, OnePlus phones are far more secure.

It also has another meaning that One is the user and Plus means he will keep on recommending it to others because the quality of the product is very good. The name One (Model Name) is due to the fact that it is our first phone.
